name: New Pilot Plane Parking 3D
description:
Welcome to the airplane parking!!
Become the real aeroplane parking master!!
Start your professional career of fly aeroplane parking today!!



TIPS:

- Don’t let finish your fuel on the way while helicopter parking
- Clear all missions of parking airplane before time
- Get extra bonus as a cash reward
- Unlock new exciting features of parking aeroplanes
- Customize and upgrade your fly airplanes



Game Play Controls:

- Tilt
- Buttons
- Steering


Exciting Features:

- HD graphics
- 3D camera views
- Aircraft marshalling
- World's best airports
- Multiple flying aircrafts
- Plenty of flying aeroplanes
